title:
What are the words to the song/poem about the streets downtown. I heard it once...



There once was a Queen who lived in a Castle and decided to visit the Church to see her sister the Nun who gave her a Orange to take to the Dock near the Market where she ran into the Princess who had a Chestnut so they said Grace..... discovered a Walnut and prayed to the Red Cross



I am sure it is quite different but that is the jist of it. I thought is was a quaint story.



Thank you-
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=8871 (But I like your version better.)
